message:
SYSTEM: Blozano.pdf: Página 28
Set your title here in Slide Master Options
28
▪If we assuming that the complexity of a text increases 
as its length increases, the logic used to infer topics is 
unable to capture more complex knowledge than was 
proposed during training
▪The larger the corpus and the more topics it contains 
(i.e. the more diverse the content of its documents), 
the more appropriate it is to use similarity metrics 
based on hierarchical representations of the topics
Conclusion
speaker: SYSTEM
